p: The additives had no effect on the relative abundance of Euryarchaeota in the present study. Shi etÂ al. (2014) suggested that the number of Euryarchaeota was not as important for the CH 4 yield as the metabolic activity of individual methanogenic species. However, in the present study, there was a positive correlation between Euryarchaeota and CH 4 production, expressed as a percentage of the total gas.
